title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.23 - Application for rule making
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 647.23 - Application for rule making

State Regulations

Any person may apply to the board for rule making, amendatory of this Part. Such application shall specify with particularity the
section or sections to be changed, the proposed new language and the reasons
therefor. The application shall be served on the commissioner and filed with
the board's docket clerk in an original and five copies. The board may also
institute rule making on its own motion, as provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
647.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
